channel.title: Need dragon claws emote
channel.description:
well I searched on google about dragon claw special and getting the emote and 4 times hit etc.
but I can only find things for 317 , but guess Dddesscape is 508. And the .java files they call there I don't have.
who can explain me to add the special attack bar, 4 times hit and special attack emote?
ty

item.title: Need dragon claws emote
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

ty :D. i’ve got the bar now

U posted dddescape isn’t it?

well , i’ve tried to add chaotic weapons ;p.
but if I spawn them it’s a null ;(

Read full topic

item.title: Need dragon claws emote
item.dc:creator: @CoD4Erik CoD4Erik
item.description:
@CoD4Erik wrote:

To add the special attack bar, but this won’t make the special work, go into Special.java. Once you’re in it, search case 5698. Copy that code, then under it, paste it again, but change the 5698 to your dragon claws ID #. I do not know how to make the special attack actually work, though. I just made a post asking for a good tutorial on it.

Read full topic
